room_phrases: Walk on Wired is my guidance.

playground_overview.selector_filter_by: Selector can get o filtered by

playground_overview_explains.short_period: This trigger does not need a user, bot or pet to work, its function is to repeat infinitely the effects of the stack.
playground_overview_explains.has_handitem: When the avatar reach the "coffee" drink the condition will be activated.
playground_overview_explains.selector_users_area_playground: This selector allows you to obtain all the users who are in a certain area of the room defined by you.
